profile.name: Bill The Dev
profile.title: Senior Unity Engineer & Technical Artist
profile.quote: Optimization is not just a phase; it is the architecture of immersion.
profile.about: Elite Unity Specialist and Technical Artist with a proven track record of shipping high-performance VR titles and industrial digital twins. Currently driving core development for 'Shmackle' (Live on Meta Quest 2/3/3s, 100k+ players), where I architect custom HLSL shader pipelines and optimize complex multiplayer infrastructures. My expertise bridges the gap between deep C# architecture and high-fidelity technical art, enabling me to build tools that accelerate production and games that define markets. Notable achievements include presenting real-time Omniverse solutions directly to NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang at the AI Summit 2024 and achieving 300% threading performance gains in 'Animal Push Royale'. I am a 'Jack of all trades' in immersive tech—balancing the logic of a Senior Programmer with the creative vision of a Lead Technical Artist.
profile.location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam (Open to Remote/Relocation)

dev.desc: Lead Developer and Technical Artist for 'Shmackle', a live service VR title on Meta Quest 2, 3, and 3s with hundreds of thousands of active players. Responsible for the entire technical art pipeline, core gameplay systems, and multiplayer optimization.
achievements: Architected the 'Shmackle Pad™' ecosystem: A complex, diegetic in-game tablet system handling player customization, social networking, real-time store transactions, and inventory management.

Engineered a production-grade HLSL Shader Library defining the game's visual identity, including: 'Ghost Shader' (ethereal transparency), 'Xray Shader' (strategic wall-hacks), 'Stylized Metallic' (PBR approximation), and 'Fake Liquid' (optimized fluid dynamics).
Implemented 'Swap Texture Effects' for the Shooting Range, enabling seamless, zero-latency scene transitions that immerse players in distinct environments without loading screens.
Optimized the rendering pipeline for Meta Quest hardware using 'Additive Glass Optimization' and 'TextMeshPro Opaque' techniques, maintaining a stable 72+ FPS while reducing draw calls by 40%.
Solved critical VR motion sickness issues by refining locomotion physics and implementing dynamic field-of-view tunneling during high-velocity gameplay.
Developed 'Aura' and 'Hologram' shaders to provide clear visual feedback for interactive objects, significantly improving user experience (UX) in a noisy multiplayer environment.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to debug and resolve complex multiplayer synchronization issues, ensuring smooth physics replication for thousands of concurrent users.

dev.desc: Key R&D Engineer for industrial-grade Digital Twin solutions and immersive automotive experiences. Selected as the technical representative to showcase Vietnam's innovation to global tech leaders.
achievements: Presented the 'Omniverse Digital Twin' solution directly to NVIDIA CEO Jensen Huang at the AI Summit 2024. Demonstrated real-time synchronization between Unity and NVIDIA Omniverse using Python to control conveyor belts and lighting systems.

Spearheaded optimization for 'Animal Push Royale' (Top 6 Vietnam GameVerse Finalist), achieving a 300% performance increase by rewriting the threading model and implementing custom vertex-displacement shaders for Water and Lava.
Developed the 'Honda VR' experience using Holoride technology. Engineered a 'Day-Night Synchronization' system and optimized FPS for in-car VR entertainment.
Created 'Bill Utils', a proprietary internal toolset that automated asset import workflows and scene management, reducing the 3D team's manual setup time by approx. 40%.
Conducted 'VR Motion Sickness Research', designing and testing physiological comfort algorithms that were subsequently adopted as best practices for all internal VR projects.
Transitioned 'Animal Push Royale' UI from 2D to Dynamic 3D, and implemented a secure Single Sign-On (SSO) system for seamless user authentication.
Designed an offline tutorial level with scripted events to improve player retention during the onboarding phase.

dev.desc: End-to-end developer for mobile casual titles, responsible for refactoring legacy codebases and implementing scalable game architecture.
achievements: Shipped 'Merge Fruit', taking full ownership of the product lifecycle from prototype to release. Managed communication between game designers and artists to ensure vision alignment.
Refactored the codebase for 'Drink Game', a social party app. Implemented a modular mini-game architecture that allowed for rapid addition of new content without breaking existing logic.
Optimized mobile performance for iOS and Android, reducing build size and improving battery efficiency for casual gaming sessions.

dev.desc: Gameplay Programmer for 'Applaydu', a high-profile edutainment application with millions of downloads.
achievements: Credited as the first intern to ship production code for 'Applaydu', specifically solving complex UI/Font fragmentation issues across hundreds of Android devices.
Developed core mechanics for the 'Treasure Toss' and 'Animalody' mini-games, adhering to strict Enterprise Scrum/Agile workflows.
Utilized Git flow and internal code review processes to maintain high code quality and prevent regression in a massive codebase.

dev.desc: Junior developer focusing on children's educational games.
achievements: Developed 'Biboo - Drawing Game for Kids', integrating touch-input smoothing algorithms and interactive animations to encourage artistic exploration.
Collaborated with a small indie team to rapid-prototype gameplay mechanics, learning the fundamentals of game loops and state management.

teaching.desc: Lead Instructor for advanced game development courses and strategic Marketing Lead driving brand growth.
achievements: Designed and delivered an advanced curriculum covering Shader Graph, VFX, and Optimization workflows, targeting aspiring technical artists.
As Marketing Lead, spearheaded content strategies that integrated emerging tech trends (AI, VR), significantly increasing student engagement and course enrollment.
Mentored students on portfolio development, code architecture, and industry best practices.

teaching.desc: Educational consultant for a Y-Combinator backed EdTech startup.
achievements: Led 'Team Codi' to develop the 'Marathon Talent AR App', managing the technical roadmap and feature implementation.
Provided expert guidance to learners, designing personalized Computer Science learning plans and helping them access relevant resources.

teaching.desc: Promoted from Teaching Assistant to Lead Teacher in just 2 months due to exceptional performance.
achievements: Taught over 2,500 hours of coding classes (Python, Game Design, Robotics).
Mentored students to achieve top placements in international competitions: IKCC Top 10, HKICO Medals, and the Tech Award at Hanoi STEAM Hack Day.
Developed dynamic learning environments that fostered creativity and critical thinking for students aged 8-16.

education.desc: Completed Computer Science fundamentals with a focus on Software Architecture and 3D Graphics. pivoted to full-time professional industry development during the final year.
achievements: Talent Scholarship Winner: Awarded a 30% merit-based scholarship, selected from the top tier of 10,000+ candidates.
Specialized in Python and C# application development.

education.school: EMASI Van Phuc International Bilingual School
education.desc: Graduated with a GPA of 9.2/10. Built a strong foundation in Bilingual STEM education and Robotics.
achievements: President of Pacific House & Founder of Fitness and Healthy Club.
Won 2 Silver Medals in the Ivy Prep English Debate Championship.
1st Prize Winner: Christmas Game Coding Competition.
School Event MC for major ceremonies.

skills.name: C# & .NET Architecture
skills.desc: Advanced OOP, Design Patterns (Singleton, Observer, Factory), Multithreading, Memory Management, LINQ, Async/Await.

skills.name: Unity Engine Mastery
skills.desc: Unity 2021/2022/2023, DOTS (ECS/Jobs/Burst), Addressables, Asset Bundles, Custom Editor Scripting, URP/HDRP Pipelines.

skills.name: HLSL & Technical Art
skills.desc: Custom Surface/Vertex Shaders, Shader Graph, VFX Graph, Compute Shaders, Raymarching, Render Pipeline Customization.

skills.name: VR/AR Development
skills.desc: Meta Quest SDK (Interaction/Passthrough), Holoride SDK, AR Foundation, OpenXR, VR Performance Optimization (72/90/120Hz target).

skills.name: Multiplayer & Networking
skills.desc: Photon Fusion/PUN2, SmartFox Server, State Synchronization, Lag Compensation, Interpolation/Extrapolation, RPCs.

skills.name: Performance Optimization
skills.desc: Profiler/Frame Debugger analysis, Draw Call reduction (Batching/GPU Instancing), GC allocation reduction, Texture Compression/Atlasing.

skills.name: Tool Development
skills.desc: Python Automation (Blender/Maya APIs), Unity Editor Windows, Build Pipelines (CI/CD), Automated Asset Processing.

skills.name: NVIDIA Omniverse
skills.desc: USD Workflow, Python Connectors, Real-time Digital Twin Synchronization, Physics Simulation.

skills.name: Web & Backend
skills.desc: HTML5/CSS3, JavaScript/TypeScript, React Basics, Node.js Basics, REST APIs, Firebase.

portfolio.title: Bill's DevSprint (SaaS)
portfolio.description: A comprehensive Project Management SaaS built specifically for indie game developers. Features include dynamic wallpaper themes, Google Drive deep-integration, drag-and-drop asset management, smart labeling systems, and cloud storage management. Designed and shipped in 48 hours to demonstrate rapid full-stack capability.

portfolio.title: Responsive WebGL Template
portfolio.description: The definitive open-source solution for Unity WebGL responsiveness. Solves the notorious full-window display issues on mobile and desktop browsers. Widely adopted by the itch.io developer community for its reliability and ease of use (simple drop-in installation).

portfolio.title: Bill Biome Shader
portfolio.description: A high-performance terrain shader supporting 4-layer texture blending, tessellation, and procedural noise texturing. Specifically optimized for Mobile and VR hardware constraints, offering AAA-quality terrain visuals at a fraction of the performance cost of standard terrain systems.

portfolio.title: Animal Push Royale
portfolio.description: A physics-based multiplayer battle royale that ranked Top 6 in the Vietnam GameVerse 2024. I achieved a massive 300% performance boost by implementing a custom threading model and rewriting expensive shader logic. Features include a custom offline tutorial, dynamic 3D UI, and secure SSO login.

portfolio.title: Spaceship Modular System
portfolio.description: A sophisticated Unity Editor tool allowing players and designers to construct modular spaceships part-by-part. Implements complex snap-point logic, serialization for saving/loading designs, and a user-friendly drag-and-drop interface. Demonstrates advanced Editor Scripting capabilities.

portfolio.title: Blender Texture Baker
portfolio.description: Automated Python pipeline for Blender that bakes PBR textures (Albedo, Normal, Roughness, Metallic) from High-Poly to Low-Poly models in a single click. Drastically reduces manual UV unwrapping and baking time for asset production pipelines.

portfolio.title: Bill SSOutline (URP)
portfolio.description: A robust Screen-Space Outline shader for Unity URP. Features configurable depth and normal sensitivity, color control, and line thickness. This shader is the backbone of the stylized art direction in several of my projects.

portfolio.title: MemeCrawler AI
portfolio.description: An AI-powered web scraper that autonomously fetches and categorizes internet memes for video editing workflows. Demonstrates strong skills in Python, API integration, and handling unstructured data.

portfolio.title: Sketchfab Gallery
portfolio.description: A web-based tool that dynamically fetches and displays 3D models using the Sketchfab Public API. Allows users to browse and preview low-poly assets directly in the browser.

portfolio.title: Food Ping Pong
portfolio.description: A fast-paced arcade game developed during the Korea Game Jam. Features custom physics interactions and a 'Juicy' game feel. Showcases the ability to deliver polished gameplay under tight 48-hour deadlines.

portfolio.title: Scene Switcher Tool
portfolio.description: A Unity Editor extension that streamlines scene management. Allows developers to switch, load, and unload scenes instantly via a custom overlay, significantly reducing friction during large-scale project development.

portfolio.title: Auto Subtitle Tool
portfolio.description: A Python-based utility that generates subtitles for videos automatically. Utilizes the SpeechRecognition library and Pytube to process audio tracks and export SRT files, automating a tedious part of the content creation pipeline.

portfolio.title: Chatbot API Integration
portfolio.description: A lightweight web application experimenting with the Gemini API. Demonstrates the ability to connect frontend interfaces with complex backend AI services, handling asynchronous requests and JSON responses.

portfolio.title: Puffy (GMTK Game Jam)
portfolio.description: A creative puzzle platformer developed for the GMTK Game Jam alongside notable community developers. Features unique 'inflation' mechanics and soft-body physics simulations.

portfolio.title: DragSlice
portfolio.description: Featured entry in the Korea and Viet Game Contest. A mobile game focused on precision touch inputs and slicing mechanics, demonstrating expertise in touch-handling algorithms and mobile UX.

testimonials.quote: Bill is a force of nature. His persistence and energy are unmatched; he attacks complex game development challenges with a relentlessness that inspires the whole team.
testimonials.author: Duc Anh (Sora The Dev)

testimonials.quote: A true technical virtuoso. Bill possesses that rare combination of deep programming logic and artistic intuition. He is a pro in every sense of the word.
testimonials.author: Ngoc Thuan

testimonials.quote: Flawless delivery. Bill is the engineer you want when deadlines are tight. He hits every milestone with precision and reliability.
testimonials.author: Quang Ngo

testimonials.quote: Rapid prototyping machine. Bill absorbs requirements and outputs high-quality, focused code faster than anyone I've worked with.
testimonials.author: Nguyen Hoang Cuong
